## Group Work



### Assign Roles

* Assign roles for each box on the network



### Strategy

* 30 min "Go Plan?"
* Which parts from the hackpack do you need
* How will injects get done?



### Hackpack

* Print off parts of hackpack that will be needed
* Write some pages specifc to the competition
